meaningMnemonic: There is an <radical>insect</radical> on the <radical>roof</radical> in a <radical>spoon</radical>. It's there for the eating, and it's how you plan to attract a <kanji>snake</kanji> to your roof.
readingMnemonic: Why don't you just bring a <kanji>snake</kanji> up to the roof yourself? Because snakes are <reading>heavy</reading> (へび).
